education.institute: Narsee Monjee Institue of Management Studies (NMIMS)

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
description: Currently working on building and laying down the foundations of the UniCreds web platform.
Occasionally delve across the stack to build REST APIs that are central to the functioning of the web platform.

experience.title: Freelance Software Engineer
description: Built a mobile app called SmartSeva for the aid of the elderly for my first client, where I proactively worked to exceed my client’s expectations.
Built the ​Impetusutra​ app to help my client onboard customers and give them an ecosystem to connect better with the company.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Worked across the stack, building a social platform for fashion enthusiasts, influencers, and people in need of fashion inspiration.

Designed, planned, and developed the WARDROBE app from the ground up, mostly working on the front end of the cross-platform app with Flutter, handling API calls, transitions, routing, and providing an intuitive user experience.

experience.title: Web Developer Intern
description: Successfully assisted efforts to revamp the NGO's website while working with HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, and jQuery.

projects.title: QuickGrab
projects.description: QuickGrab tries to help and promote the effective practice of social distancing by allowing people to go to shops in slots. It gives local shops an online presence by providing a platform for them to serve customers without the need for excessive logistics.

projects.title: Gilbreth
projects.description: Given a flowchart according to the defined syntax, Gilbreth detects, recognizes, and parses the flowchart into a traversable abstract syntax tree.

projects.title: DeleGo for Mumbai MUN 2019
projects.description: DeleGo helps organize data about delegates, panels, and hosts while automating the registration, food coupon system, and other pipelines for the event.

achievements: Winner of Smart India Hackathon, 2019, organized by the Government of India, under the problem statement ‘Invoice processing using RPA’.
Winner of IET’s Hack-N-Code 2.0, 2018, organized by IET, MPSTME.
Winner of Android Development Competition organized by the Computer Engineering Department in collaboration with the Network for the Open Web Mozilla Club.

certifications.title: Node.js: The Complete Guide to Build RESTful APIs
EMC Academic Associate, Cloud Infrastructure and Services

publications.title: A review of Security Challenges in Home Automation Systems
publications.medium: 2019 IEEE International Conference on System, Computation, Automation, and Networking (ICSCAN)

miscellaneous: Served as the Head of Technology at Model United Nations Society, MPSTME.
I love football and I was a first-team player for my school football team.
